NOBODY HAS EVER HEARD OF AN AUDIO FORMAT CALLED "XDEFF"!!! Google it and see that most hits turn up on torrent sites only! Something very fishy here!

PLEASE USE A FORMAT PEOPLE ACTUALLY USE FOR AUDIO UPLOADS LIKE: MP3,MP4/AAC, OR BEST OFF ALL USE FLAC
i use XDEF.. which is basically mp3.. just enhanced
